title: Victorious Ward Skin???
body: I bought the Greater Vision Totem (The pink ward trinket) and I saw the Victorious ward skin. I don't know if that is something only I see but yeah. {{item:3362}}

replies.body: Greater Vision Totem = a full ward - so it uses your ward skin
That's not my ward skin that's the issue
ahhh. Welp; good report there XD
Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!
I have the same problem but I don't see the Viktorious ward skin but the Dragonslayer Poro ward skin.
Same thing, I have the gentleman poro skin and when I buy that I get the astronaut poro ward skin
